### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, -58.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 2.5, -58.5)
- Boiler (position 0.5, -62.0) 
- Offshore pump (position -67.5, -98.5)

### Copper plate factory at position(4.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 4.0, -62.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified)
- Assembling machine (position not specified)
- Inserter (position not specified)

### Lab at position(not specified)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position not specified)

### PipeGroup at position(not specified)
Consists of the following entities:
- PipeGroup (position not specified)

### ElectricityGroup at position(not specified)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electric poles (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into entities
- Ensure that the second argument in the `insert_item` function is an Entity or EntityGroup, not a Position. Always verify the type of the entity being referenced.

### Errors when attempting to insert without sufficient inventory
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. Check your inventory before performing insert operations.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target position.
